name: Hunger Apartment
detailed_description:
In the barren end of the word, everyone has the same dream: No need to worry about tomorrow's survival…

Luckily! You strayed into an apartment building, crashed into the utopia of everyone's dreams.

This place is called HUNGER APARTMENT. Not only will it feed and clothe you, but it will also satisfy all your fantasies.

Of course, the price you need to pay is very low. It’s merely your delicious #humanity#.

However, when you discover layers and layers of conspiracy, peel away layers and layers of lies, will it still be your dream? Will it still be your destination? Will it make you surrender your humanity?

Will you decide to clear your thinking in the chaos and find out the truth in the darkness? Or will you choose to continue your dream in a catnap, and live the rest of your life in easiness?

Come to HUNGER APARTMENT and join a marvelous and superb 2D horizontal decryption adventurous performance! At the end of the story can… you… still… hold… your… bottom… line…

Game features:


Distinct double heroes!
Will it tear apart your remaining #mind#?


Distant eyes!
Will your curiosity be crushed out by #"them"#?


Wordless #conspiracy#!
You will face the thrilling truth!


To live or to give up!
Look forward to seeing your every #choice#

Shh!
Listen to those sound of #fear# from deep inside carefully!

Immersive!
Wonderful music and vivid sound effect from Fine Products and Academics.

short_description: This place is called HUNGER APARTMENT. Not only will it feed and clothe you, but it will also satisfy all your fantasies.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Korean*, Thai*, Portuguese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Vietnamese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Dual CPU E2180 2.00GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 600M / ATI Radeon HD 5450 (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 – 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 730 (1Gb) / Radeon R7 A10-7700K
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOSX 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 – 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOSX 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400S, 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS or more
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 Gb
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS or more
  • Processor: Core i5 – 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 Gb
